A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've seen this film twice and it's incredible\, my new favorite out of all of the Star Wars films including Empire Strikes Back (now my Second favorite) Mark Hamill deserves an Oscar for his performance. Pure\, raw emotion can be felt every time he is on screen. Plenty of unexpected turns and I my opinion this is what Star Wars needed\, a shift in direction and tone. To quote Luke Skywalker himself.  \"This is not going to go the way you think.\"
